verses.verse: בָּעֵ֨ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֜וא <WH1931> he אָמַ֧ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me פְּסָל־ <WH6458> unto me Hew לְךָ֞ שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> thee two לוּחֹ֤ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> of stone כָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> like unto the first וַעֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> and come up אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to הָהָ֑רָה <WH2022> unto me into the mount וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> and make לְּךָ֖ אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> thee an ark עֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> of wood

וְאֶכְתֹּב֙ <WH3789> And I will write עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> on the tables אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָי֛וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שִׁבַּ֑רְתָּ <WH7665> which thou brakest וְשַׂמְתָּ֖ם <WH7760> and thou shalt put בָּאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> them in the ark

וָאַ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And I made אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> an ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וָאֶפְסֹ֛ל <WH6458> and hewed שְׁנֵי־ <WH8147> two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> like unto the first וָאַ֣עַל <WH5927> and went up הָהָ֔רָה <WH2022> into the mount וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> having the two הַלֻּחֹ֖ת <WH3871> tables בְּיָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> in mine hand

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> And he wrote עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַלֻּחֹ֜ת <WH3871> on the tables כַּמִּכְתָּ֣ב <WH4385> writing הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> according to the first אֵ֚ת <WH853> עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> the ten הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּר֩ <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <WH413> to you בָּהָ֛ר <WH2022> unto you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of the fire בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> of the assembly וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> then

וָאֵ֗פֶן <WH6437> And I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <WH3381> myself and came down מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> from the mount וָֽאָשִׂם֙ <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> the tables בָּאָר֖וֹן <WH727> in the ark אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> which I had made וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <WH1961> become שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and there כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוַּ֖נִי <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and there they be as the LORD

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel נָֽסְע֛וּ <WH5265> took their journey מִבְּאֵרֹ֥ת בְּנֵי־ יַעֲקָ֖ן <WH885> from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan מוֹסֵרָ֑ה <WH4149> to Mosera שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There מֵ֤ת <WH4191> died אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> there Aaron וַיִּקָּבֵ֣ר <WH6912> and there he was buried שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and there וַיְכַהֵ֛ן <WH3547> ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> and Eleazar בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there נָסְע֖וּ <WH5265> From thence they journeyed הַגֻּדְגֹּ֑דָה <WH1412> unto Gudgodah וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הַגֻּדְגֹּ֣דָה <WH1412> and from Gudgodah יָטְבָ֔תָה <WH3193> to Jotbath אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> a land נַֽחֲלֵי <WH5158> of rivers מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of waters

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗וא <WH1931> he הִבְדִּ֤יל <WH914> separated יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲמֹד֩ <WH5975> to stand לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD לְשָֽׁרְתוֹ֙ <WH8334> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> in his name עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> have לְלֵוִ֛י <WH3881> Leviite חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> nor inheritance עִם־ <WH5973> with אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> with his brethren יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> [is] his inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> promised יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לֽוֹ׃

וְאָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I עָמַ֣דְתִּי <WH5975> And I stayed בָהָ֗ר <WH2022> in the mount כַּיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> time הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> according to the first אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> nights וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about גַּ֚ם <WH1571> also בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> unto me at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֥ה <WH14> would יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> also [and] the LORD הַשְׁחִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7843> not destroy

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me ק֛וּם <WH6965> unto me Arise לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> proceed לְמַסַּ֖ע <WH4550> [thy] journey לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וְיָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> that they may go in וְיִֽרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH1> unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶֽם׃ פ

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And now Israel מָ֚ה <WH4100> what יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God שֹׁאֵ֖ל <WH7592> require מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but לְ֠יִרְאָה <WH3372> of thee but to fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> to walk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָיו֙ <WH1870> in all his ways וּלְאַהֲבָ֣ה <WH157> and to love אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְלַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> him and to serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> with all thy heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> and with all thy soul

לִשְׁמֹ֞ר <WH8104> To keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֤ת <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתָ֔יו <WH2708> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לְט֖וֹב <WH2896> good לָֽךְ׃

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> Behold לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD'S אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> Behold the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> and the heaven הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heavens הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּֽהּ׃

רַ֧ק <WH7535> but בַּאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> in thy fathers חָשַׁ֥ק <WH2836> had a delight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Only the LORD לְאַהֲבָ֣ה <WH157> to love אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיִּבְחַ֞ר <WH977> them and he chose בְּזַרְעָ֣ם <WH2233> their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> after בָּכֶ֛ם מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> them [even] you above all people כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וּמַלְתֶּ֕ם <WH4135> Circumcise אֵ֖ת <WH853> עָרְלַ֣ת <WH6190> therefore the foreskin לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> of your heart וְעָ֨רְפְּכֶ֔ם <WH6203> your neck לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH7185> and stiffen עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer

כִּ֚י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God ה֚וּא <WH1931> he אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> [is] God הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of gods וַאֲדֹנֵ֖י <WH136> and the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <WH113> and Lord הָאֵ֨ל <WH410> God הַגָּדֹ֤ל <WH1419> a great הַגִּבֹּר֙ <WH1368> a mighty וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <WH3372> and a terrible אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> which regardeth פָנִ֔ים <WH6440> not persons וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִקַּ֖ח <WH3947> nor taketh שֹֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> reward

עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> He doth execute מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> the judgment יָת֖וֹם <WH3490> of the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <WH490> and widow וְאֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> and loveth גֵּ֔ר <WH1616> the stranger לָ֥תֶת <WH5414> in giving ל֖וֹ לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> him food וְשִׂמְלָֽה׃ <WH8071> and raiment

וַאֲהַבְתֶּ֖ם <WH157> Love אֶת־ <WH853> הַגֵּ֑ר <WH1616> ye therefore the stranger כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֵרִ֥ים <WH1616> for ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> Thou shalt fear אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> תַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> him shalt thou serve וּב֣וֹ תִדְבָּ֔ק <WH1692> and to him shalt thou cleave וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <WH7650> and swear

ה֥וּא <WH1931> He תְהִלָּתְךָ֖ <WH8416> He [is] thy praise וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and He אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> and he [is] thy God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> that hath done אִתְּךָ֗ <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> הַגְּדֹלֹ֤ת <WH1419> for thee these great וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנּֽוֹרָאֹת֙ <WH3372> and terrible things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָא֖וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> which thine eyes

בְּשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> with threescore and ten נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> persons יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> went down אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> Thy fathers מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now שָֽׂמְךָ֙ <WH7760> hath made יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and now the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <WH3556> thee as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude
